rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever The Deep Ones deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of that player’s library. Exile one face down, then put the rest into that player’s graveyard.
{1}{B}{B}, Discard your hand: Cast any number of cards exiled with The Deep Ones without paying their mana costs. You lose life equal to the total mana value of cards cast this way.
